comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Mrs. George Thacher Guernsey, born Sarah Elizabeth Mitchell, in Salem OH; she moved to Kansas with her parents in 1863; attended the state normal school, worked as a teacher and as a school principal; raised three children; ran for president of the DAR in 1915. skyways.lib.ks.us/genweb/archives/1918ks/biog/guernsgt.html
